languages.text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +11% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources. This effect stacks up to {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} times. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (11): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −11 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 Perception

traits.locale_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +11% more damage from all sources. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} stacks up to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} times. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (11): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −11 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their characteristics equal to the castigating parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 Perception

Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +11% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources. This effect stacks up to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} times. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (11): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −11 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 Perception

Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +11% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources. This effect stacks up to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} times. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (11): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −11 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 Perception

languages.text: 被导航者能力影响的敌人，承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高11%，此效果可叠加{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}次。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}惩戒{/g}（11）：所有被导航者能力影响的敌人，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}降低11点，效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果攻击相同敌人时可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +15感知
languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +11% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources. This effect stacks up to {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} times. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (11): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −11 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 Perception

traits.locale_text: 被导航者能力影响的敌人，承受的所有伤害提高11%。此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}可叠加多次，最大次数等同于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}惩戒{/g}（11）：所有被导航者能力影响的敌人，所有属性降低11点（等同于“惩戒”属性值），效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +15感知

被导航者能力影响的敌人，承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高11%，此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}可叠加{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}次。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}惩戒{/g}（11）：所有被导航者能力影响的敌人，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}降低11点，效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果攻击相同敌人时可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +15感知

languages.text: Противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают на 11% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} из всех источников. Этот эффект суммируется до {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} раз. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Бичевание{/g} (11): противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −11 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот штраф суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +15 к Восприятию
languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +11% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources. This effect stacks up to {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} times. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (11): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −11 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 Perception

traits.locale_text: Противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают на 11% больше урона из всех источников. Этот {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} суммируется до {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} раз. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Бичевание{/g} (11): противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −11 (равный уровню Бичевания) ко всем характеристикам до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +15 к Восприятию

Противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают на 11% больше урона из всех источников. Этот {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} суммируется до {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} раз. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Бичевание{/g} (11): противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −11 (равный уровню Бичевания) ко всем характеристикам до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +15 к Восприятию

languages.text: 航宙士のパワーのターゲットにされた敵は、全ソースから与えられる{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+11%増加する。この効果は{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}回数までスタックする。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}非難{/g} (11) ： 航宙士のパワーのターゲットとなった敵は、航宙士の次のターンが終わるまで、{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に対して、 −11の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。このペナルティはスタックされ、スタックのたびに航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで長引く。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+10増加 知覚が+15増加
languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +11% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources. This effect stacks up to {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} times. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (11): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −11 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 Perception

traits.locale_text: 航宙士のパワーのターゲットにされた敵は、全ソースから与えられるダメージが+11%増加する。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果は{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}パー{/g}・{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} 回数までスタックする。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}非難{/g} (11) ： 航宙士のパワーのターゲットとなった敵は、航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終わるまで、全て非難のパラメータと同等の特性に対して、 −11の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。このボーナスはスタックされ、スタックのたびに航宙士の次のターンまで長引く。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ウィルパワーが{/g}+10増加 知覚は+15

languages.text: Los enemigos objetivo de poderes de navegante sufren un +11 % más de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de todas las fuentes. Este efecto se acumula hasta {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} veces. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigo{/g} (11): Los enemigos objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −11 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante. Esta penalización se acumula y se prolonga hasta el próximo turno del navegante cada vez que se aplica. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +15 de Percepción
languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +11% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources. This effect stacks up to {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} times. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (11): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −11 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 Perception

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos objetivo de poderes de navegante sufren un +11 % más de daño de todas las fuentes. Este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} se acumula hasta {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} veces. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigo{/g} (11): Los enemigos que son objetivo de un poder del navegante sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -11 a todas sus características hasta el fin del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante. Esta bonificación se acumula y se prolonga hasta el próximo turno del navegante cada vez que se aplica. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +15 de Percepción

languages.text: Feinde, die von Navigator-Kräften angegriffen werden, erleiden +11 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aus allen Quellen. Dieser Effekt kann bis zu {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} Mal gestapelt werden. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Geißelnd{/g} (11): Feinde, die von Navigator-Kräften angegriffen werden, erleiden bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Navigators einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −11 auf sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Dieser Abzug ist stapelbar und wird mit jedem Stapel bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +15 Wahrnehmung
languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +11% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources. This effect stacks up to {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} times. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (11): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −11 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 Perception

traits.locale_text: Feinde, die von Navigator-Kräften angegriffen werden, erleiden +11 % mehr Schaden aus allen Quellen. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} kann bis zu {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}x addiert werden. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Geißelnds{/g} (11):Feinde, die von Navigator-Kräften angegriffen werden, erleiden bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Navigators einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -11 auf alle ihre Eigenschaften in Höhe des Geißelung-Parameters. Dieser Bonus addiert sich und wird jedes Mal, wenn er aufaddiert wird, bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +15 Wahrnehmung

languages.text: Les ennemis ciblés par des pouvoirs du navigateur subissent 11 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires, toutes sources confondues. Cet effet est cumulable {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} fois. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Fustigation{/g} (11) : une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −11 s'applique à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des ennemis ciblés par les pouvoirs du navigateur jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Cette pénalité est cumulable, et à chaque cumul il est prolongé jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +15 de Perception

languages.text: Rotacı güçlerinin hedeflediği düşmanlar, tüm kaynaklardan +%11 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alırlar. Bu etki, en fazla {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} kadar üst üste birikir. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Kırbaçlayıcı{/g} (11): Rotacı güçlerinin hedef aldığı düşmanlar, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} −11 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alırlar. Bu etki, Rotacı'nın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer. Bu ceza puanı üst üste birikir ve her yeni birikimde etki süresi Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turuna dek uzar. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} +15 Algı
